articles.description: With Melburnians fearing another lockdown, a top infectious diseases expert has called for a shortening of the gap between AstraZeneca doses, to ensure people are fully protected quicker.
articles.content:
It has been absolutely flat chat, Dr Hodgson said on Wednesday.
After weeks of observing high vaccine hesitancy and very low uptake, which left hundreds of doses of unused AstraZeneca in the fridge,… [+3795 chars]
